import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; import { Contact } from '../contact.model'; @Component({ selector: 'cms-contact-detail', templateUrl: './contact-detail.component.html', styleUrls: ['./contact-detail.component.css'] }) export class ContactDetailComponent { @Input() contact: Contact; }

{{contact.name}}

Email: {{contact.e}}
